channel.title: The Free Mom Hugs Tour
channel.description: The Free Mom Hugs Tour is a yearly journey of the Free Mom Hugs crew to sites of historical significance to the LGBTQ+ community. Sites visited in the past include Sontewall, Laramie Wyoming, and San Francisco. The purpose of the tour is to fulfill the mission of Free Mom Hugs: Empowering the world to celebrate the LGBTQIA+ community through visibility, education, and conversation. And yes, we still give hugs!
channel.generator: Free Mom Hugs API RSS Generator 1.00
